thread.title_full: Ground News - Modi govt. trying to ‘cover up’ worst territorial setbacks in eastern Ladakh in past six decades: Congress

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Modi govt. trying to ‘cover up’ worst territorial setbacks in eastern Ladakh in past six decades: Congress
text:
Summary by Ground News Chinese troops have been denying Indian patrols access to the strategic Depsang Plains, Demchok and other areas in eastern Ladakh since May 2020, the Congress alleged. A landmark at the site of the legendary Rezang La battle of the 1962 Sino- India conflict in Ladakh was dismantled as part of the disengagement process with China. Share menu More
